comments.content:
With this set of letters I couldn't decide for certain if this is Helvetica Bold [http://www.identifont.com/find?font=helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824200715/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=helvetica "http://www.identifont.com/find?font=helvetica") or a very similar font such as Chalet 1960, Newhouse DT, or one of the other very similar fonts suggested by Identifont.  
Don
